title: Miscommunication?
author: verias
text:
Seems like Chrys got a little bit impatient there, and perhaps Theresa forgot that she offered to have Chrys come to her room? Is it time to quest around the Inn and taproom areas to see where Theresa has wandered off to?

Of note, designing this outfit for Chrys was a fair bit of fun, teasing out bits and pieces of it. We'll just have to see what winds up happening from here.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Coal gets ya diamonds Theresa's waiting in Chrys's room. Any takers?

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: Minor point of practicality: having never had occasion to wear one, nor a direct encounter with one (darn it), it strikes me as a matter of practicality that the panties should be worn over the garter belt straps ... imagine a bathroom emergency in which you have to undo all the straps in order to use the facility.It is possible that it might be of some importance at other moments, as well.

replies.author: Sensei Le Roof*Guest*
replies.text: So wait, no sign for hours on end and her first reaction is anything but "shit, I have to find/rescue Theresa"? I call foul.

replies.author: Sensei Le Roof*Guest*
replies.text: Huh?We see her waiting forty-five minutes (hardly "hours"), and then she decides to go back to her own room.
